column3: Added some comments and an assert.\n

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/p4497_714a3e6505d986d064d3a34038a724ac1cad5308/ for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-te
